import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PostPage = ({ pets, handleDelete }) => { const { id } = useParams(); // id is used in Route // specify the post we want to see by finding the post.id const pet = pets.find(pet => (pet.id).toString() === id); // === is for string match, == for numeric return (
{/* if post is true then && ... */} {pet && <>

{pet.pet_name}

  • Birthday: {pet.pet_dob}
  • {pet.pet_description}
  • Last Deworm date: {pet.last_deworm}
    • } {!pet && <>

    Pet Not Found

    Return to Homepage

    }
    ) } export default PostPage
